recipesJson.name: Unicorn Jack
recipesJson.author: User 640
recipesJson.description:
I wanted to do a mix with TFA Jack fruit.Unicorn Vomit is a good match and I just added the Bavarian cream and marshmallow to round it out.
It is a good shake and vape with a bit of harshness on the exhale.I will see what time does or a little tweaking
